mapper.select: select board_code, username, title, content, count, (select count(*) from board_mst) as boardCount, create_date, update_date from board_mst order by board_code desc limit #{page}, 10;
mapper.insert: insert into board_mst values( 0, #{username}, #{title}, #{content}, #{count}, now(), now() );
mapper.update: update board_mst set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where username = #{username} and board_code = #{board_code};
